name: Fashion Clicker
description:
Summary

This game is a prototype for a clicker idea. This concept gives you multiple fields to click on, adding a slight layer of strategy to your game.

Feedback 

We want your feedback! If you enjoy the game, want to offer suggestions for future features, or have any concerns, please use this link to offer us feedback on our development. If you would like to report a bug, please use this link instead.

Credits

Development Lead: Robbie Wagner

Game Developed using Unity Engine

Music Developed using BandLab

Sprites Created using Aseprite
